Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,984,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Mike Moore (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1985, off Tom Tellmann (OAK)...
Traded from Texas to Toronto on 7/31/1985 (Going to TEX: RF Glenallen Hill. Going to TOR: DH Harold Baines)...
8/8/1985: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $3,400,000 per year, for 2 years.
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 8 runs on 9/1/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/1985, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1985, hitting .372 with 9 HR, 33 RBI...
Won World Series with Toronto in 1985...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
8/1/1987: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $4,390,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won World Series with Toronto in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/1988, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/19/1989 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 6/12/1991...
